abstract: Citigroup hired an executive from UBS to head its metals and mining operations in Asia, Finance Asia reported Wednesday. The executive, Alexander Molyneux, will become managing director of the division in mid-April after leaving UBS in Australia where he was most recently an executive director in the investment banking team.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup hired an executive from UBS to head its metals and mining operations in Asia, Finance Asia reported Wednesday. The executive, Alexander Molyneux, will become managing director of the division in mid-April after leaving UBS in Australia where he was most recently an executive director in the investment banking team.

headline.main: Citigroup Hires New Chief of Asia Mining and Metals
